subject: Enquiry regarding Pro Plus X Baseplate
description_text:
Hi SIMSONN,
I recently took delivery of the Pro Plus X pedals with the baseplate, and
found that the Baseplate was scratched with paint removed in some areas -
see photos attached.

I am seeking a refund or replacement baseplate, as for a product of this
category, the manufacturing and resilience of materials is not acceptable.

Thank you!
*LD Computer Consulting*
*Mobile: *0490196928 *Email: *liamdaviesconsulting@gmail.com
*ABN: *20912747092

conversations.body_text: Hi Liam Davies, We sincerely apologize for this issue. We have already started investigating which part of the warehouse process may have caused this. In theory, such a large scratch should not have been shipped. Please provide your order number so we can check and resolve it for you.Â

Hi Simsonn, my order number is SSN3527.
Thanks.

*LD Computer Consulting*
*Mobile: *0490196928 *Email: *liamdaviesconsulting@gmail.com
*ABN: *20912747092
Hi Liam Davies,    We apologize for the delayed response. We will issue a $20 refund as compensation. Is that acceptable?

Yes, that's fine, thank you.

*LD Computer Consulting*
*Mobile: *0490196928 *Email: *liamdaviesconsulting@gmail.com
*ABN: *20912747092
Hi Liam Davies,  We have processed your refund. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.
